channel.title: Make NPC's face a different way
channel.description:
I know with like items and crap you can make face a different way, but I don't think my server is setup to do NPC's. Can someone help me?
EDT: I am running a 317 Delta if that helps.

item.title: Make NPC's face a different way
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“yodudes, post:2, topic:426809”]It’s a long process to do that. And almost every server has NPC walking, and I believe Delta does.
If you do change their direction, ALL will face that direction. I would just make the NPC’s move. If you don’t know how just message me and I’ll show you.[/quote]

That’s completely and utterly wrong. Sorry, but you’re just wrong on that one.

Use the “Search” feature, there have been multiple ways of doing it. I’m not going to spoonfeed it to you, because I just found it myself by searching. I’ll give you a piece of it:

focusPointX = 2 * i + 1;
focusPointY = 2 * j + 1;
updateRequired = true;
turnUpdateRequired = true;

You should search for things before you post a Help thread.

EDIT: Hayzie’s way is terrible, I think he did it that way on purpose.

Read full topic
item.source: Make NPC's face a different way

item.title: Make NPC's face a different way
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

It takes two minutes. Look up hayzies way on rune-s3rver.

Read full topic

If you do change their direction, ALL will face that direction. I would just make the NPC’s move. If you don’t know how just message me and I’ll show you.
